subject: Soccer
Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
World Cup 2010 (Soccer)
Executives and Management
lead_paragraph: FIFA provisionally suspended two executive committee members and four lower-ranked officials on Wednesday in a World Cup vote-selling scandal, and will continue investigating all six.
snippet: FIFA provisionally suspended two executive committee members and four lower-ranked officials on Wednesday in a World Cup vote-selling scandal, and will continue investigating all six.
